text:
CosmoCode - Berlin, full-time/part-time, Systems Administration

We're a small software company mainly creating specialized web applications and web sites (Python Django, Typo 3, Wikis, ...) for individual customers and larger agencies.

We're looking for a Linux Administrator to help with our own as well as customer's servers.

More details at: http://www.cosmocode.de/de/ueber-uns/stellenangebote/11/sysa...
